scripts.canary: yarn && nightwatch --group canary || echo "Some test(s) have failed. Check the slack channel, nightwatch_reporter"
scripts.build: yarn clean && node_modules/.bin/babel tests --out-dir lib/tests && node_modules/.bin/babel page_objects --out-dir lib/page_objects && node_modules/.bin/babel helpers.js --out-dir lib/ && node_modules/.bin/babel global.js --out-dir lib/
